reviewText: This was a good movie about the early days of Texas and the people that fought the war for her. I wish it had been alittle longer but it was good.
Title: James A. Michener's Texas

reviewText: I enjoy watching old movies and this is one of those that I do like to watch and I have watched it about 4 or 5 times.  I had it on VHS, so I wanted to get it on DVD to add to my collection.  You will enjoy this movie.
Title: James A. Michener's Texas

reviewText: We all know the story about the birth of Texas as an independent country, don't we? Grainy with decent sound, this is OK but not good in any manner.
Title: James A. Michener's Texas

reviewText: Had this for years on VCR tape. So happy to watch it on DVD. This movies characters had been perfectly casted, and the set so well done you feel like you are there with them during these early turbulant years as Texas was beginning. Another successful James A. Michner book to movie!!!Cindy
Title: James A. Michener's Texas

reviewText: The DVD was in excellent shape and the quality very good. I loved this movie because of the Historical value.

reviewText: Great Mini-Series and a pretty good history lesson on the roots of Texas.
summary: Great Mini-Series and a pretty good history lesson on the roots of Texas.

reviewText: This is a must see....  Lots of Action....Many Great Stars....and a  Wonderful Story of how Texas became "Texas"  It will leave you wanting more.

reviewText: This story brought history to life. Great lineup of actors. They need to start making made for tv Miniseries like this again. A show the whole Family can enjoy together.

reviewText: I had been waiting for it to be formatted in DVD.  Very good quality.  Package received in record time. I enjoy historical based movies whether real or fiction.

reviewText: This is really good and if you have seen centennial by Michener and liked it you can't go wrong with this either
Title: James A. Michener's Texas

reviewText: An excellent movie based upon a great book. The actors played their roles very well and were quite faithful to story.
summary: An excellent movie based upon a great book
Title: James A. Michener's Texas

reviewText: Michener wrote the book to illustrate the multiracial background of Texas.  With the movie he felt it was Pro-American and denigrated the Hispanic residents which was not what he had in mind.  The book was a great read as was the movie if you ignored the flag waving.  The main character ended up the villain who was shot down.  There was no Maddie Quimper but there was the"Old 300" who accompanied Austin into Texas.
Title: James A. Michener's Texas

reviewText: I wanted to get a bit of history after the Alamo and seek what accomplishment to defeat Sana Anna. Great review!
Title: James A. Michener's Texas

reviewText: Well done and entertaining.  Michener's book outlines the content that is factual and that which is fabricated to tell the story of Texas.  This is my second copy, and I never get tired of seeing the movie.  Acting is superb, and the story is believable.Both the book and the movie are great works.
Title: James A. Michener's Texas

reviewText: Excellent review of the great state of Texas and their drive for independence. Acting was outstanding and I recommend it very highly.
Title: James A. Michener's Texas

reviewText: Loved it, reminded me of the not in it's entirity but nonetheless a close to the truth story of the history of TEXAS.

reviewText: Glad to have this in our film library.  A very interesting and well don movie.  The actingis very good and the photography is excellent.  A great story about TEXAS.  As usualJames A. Mitchner has hit a home run with his book....  and those who converted it intoa movie cudios.Thanks for the prompt service.

reviewText: I recommend this movie and was lucky to get the movie in a fast turn around period.  If anyone watches this movie and is not inspired by it's content needs to reevaluate their western opinions  :)
